version_description:
- iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus support

- See the word count while editing your note

- Add images to your note, and quickly edit, describe, move or delete them

- Export your note as an image and share it to Twitter, Facebook and more soc
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

NEW: Customizable footer
NEW: You can now give feedbacks from inside the app
FIXED: Auto-renewal of Weibo authorization

NEW: Swipe to go back
NEW: Traditional Chinese support
IMPROVED: better cloud sync

NEW: Share your note as a Web page;
NEW: Markdown support;
NEW: You can now manually sync your notes;
IMPROVED: Sorting order under complicated sync cases.

NEW: Support iOS 9
IMPROVED: Minor bug fixes

- Added: iOS 9.1 support.
- Added: Spotlight search support (iOS 9 only).
- Added: Support under 3D Touch for creating new notes by long pressing the icon (iPhone 6s/6s Plus only).
- Added: Support for sharing to Momo's Personal Updates as an ima

- Added: Password protection; look to Settings > Touch ID & PIN Lock to enable it.
- Added: Smartisan Notes shared to Weibo as webpages now support "Da Shang."
-Fixed: Resolved a problem with failures in inputting spaces.

NEW: Folder functionality, with support for creating, editing, and deleting folders, which can be used for classifying and managing notes.
NEW: Recycling feature; you can check and restore deleted notes.
Optimized: Support for inserting multiple ima
Optimized: Bug fixes and performance improvement
Optimized: Bug fixes and performance improvement

New: Rich text format mode, support for quickly adding titles, centering, lists, bold text, quotations, and more.
New: Support for iOS 10.
Optimized: Fixed some bugs and enhanced stability.
-Optimized: Fixed some problems that can occur under iOS 7.
- Optimized: Bug fixes and performance improvement

- All-new UI optimized for iPad
- Added To-do list in rich text mode
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- All-new UI optimized for iPad
- Added To-do list in rich text mode
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

ADDED: Pull to refresh support for iPad;
ADDED: Sync improvement to avoid image/text loss;
FIXED: Significant performance improvement for iPad.
Optimized: Bug fixes and performance improvement

New: iPhone X compatibility
Other: Bug fixes and performance improvements
Optimized: Bug fixes and performance improvement
Optimized: Bug fixes and performance improvement

Fixed: the issue of occasionally unable to save notes as images
Fixed: several other bug

Optimized: Bug fixes and performance improvement

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

修复：搜索框内的放大镜图标未正确居中

New: Support SMS verification code login/registration of Smiling Cloud
